character.name: Garrus
desc: A seasoned veteran. His cards create <c=boldPink>midrow</c> objects and add other <c=boldPink>temporary</c> cards to your deck.

VicAuxPower.name: Auxiliary Power
VicAuxPower.desc: Gain {0} <c=card>Auxiliary</c> to your hand at the start of every turn.

VicAuxSurge.name: Auxiliary Surge
VicAuxSurge.desc: Gain {0} <c=card>Auxiliary B</c> to your hand at the start of every turn.

VicManeuver.name: Maneuver
VicManeuver.descB: Add a <c=card>Glide B</c> to your hand.

VicCalmUnderPressure.name: Calm Under Pressure
VicCalmUnderPressure.descA: Add a <c=card>Plan A</c> to your hand.
VicCalmUnderPressure.descB: Add a <c=card>Plan B</c> to your hand.

VicCrisisManagement.name: Threat Response
VicCrisisManagement.desc: Add a <c=card>Lockdown</c> to your draw pile.
VicCrisisManagement.descA: Add a <c=card>Lockdown A</c> to your draw pile.
VicCrisisManagement.descB: Add a <c=card>Lockdown A and B</c> to your draw pile.

VicBlockade.name: Blockade
VicBlockade.descA: Add 3 <c=card>Trap Charges</c> to your hand and gain 2 <c=status>droneshift</c>.

VicSiphon.name: Siphon Power
VicSiphon.desc: Exhaust a card in hand. Gain 1 <c=card>Auxiliary A</c> to hand.
VicSiphon.descA: Exhaust a card in hand. Gain 1 <c=card>Auxiliary A</c> to hand.
VicSiphon.descB: Exhaust a card in draw or discard pile. Gain 1 <c=card>Auxiliary A</c> to hand.

VicCalibrate.name: Calibrate
VicCalibrate.desc: Add a <c=card>Thanix Cannon</c> to your discard pile.
VicCalibrate.descA: Add a <c=card>Thanix Cannon</c> to your discard pile.
VicCalibrate.descB: Add a <c=card>Thanix Cannon B</c> to your discard pile.

VicRemember.name: Remember
VicRemember.desc: Choose a <c=cardtrait>temporary</c> card in your deck. It becomes permanent.
VicRemember.descA: Choose 2 <c=cardtrait>temporary</c> cards in your deck. They become permanent.
VicRemember.descB: Choose a card with <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> in your deck. It no longer exhausts.

VicCatEXECard.name: Garrus.EXE
VicCatEXECard.desc: Add 1 of 2 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=C8C8C8>Garrus</c> cards to your hand.
VicCatEXECard.descA: Add 1 of 2 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=C8C8C8>Garrus</c> cards to your hand.
VicCatEXECard.descB: Add 1 of 3 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=C8C8C8>Garrus</c> cards to your hand.

VicRadioSystem.name: SPARE SATELLITE
VicRadioSystem.desc: Start each combat with a bubbled <c=midrow>Signal Amplifier</c> near your ship.

VicRegenExhaust.name: ENGINE ACCELERATOR
VicRegenExhaust.desc: At the start of combat, gain a <c=card>Drift</c>.

VicPowerReserve.name: POWER RESERVE
VicPowerReserve.desc: At the start of combat, gain 3 <c=card>Auxiliary</c> cards.

VicOverclockedMissileBay.name: OVERCLOCKED MISSILE BAY
VicOverclockedMissileBay.desc: Gain 1 extra Energy every turn. Every other turn, deploy a <c=midrow>Seeker</c> aimed at yourself.

VicLevelheaded.name: TEMPORARY BOOSTER
VicLevelheaded.desc: The first 2 times you play a <c=status>Temporary</c> card each turn, draw 1 card.

Normal.name: Kinetic Barrier
Normal.description: A highly reflective field of energy. It's <c=boldPink>Indesctructible</c>. Attacking it will damage its attacker for <c=damage>1</c>.

Normal.name: Left Shift Drone
Normal.description: Shoots a <c=damage>0</c> damage shot once per turn. If it hits, it will move its target <c=boldPink>2</c> spaces to the <c=boldPink>LEFT</c>.

Normal.name: Right Shift Drone
Normal.description: Shoots a <c=damage>0</c> damage shot once per turn. If it hits, it will move its target <c=boldPink>2</c> spaces to the <c=boldPink>RIGHT</c>.

Normal.name: Engine Booster
Normal.description: Beams 1 <c=status>EVADE</c> at its target once per turn.

Normal.name: Torpedo
Normal.description: This missile is going to deal <c=damage>2</c> DMG and apply <c=damage>1</c> <c=status>ENGINE LOCK</c>.

Normal.name: Seeker
description: This missile is going to deal <c=damage>2</c> DMG.

Normal.name: Heavy Seeker
description: This missile is going to deal <c=damage>3</c> DMG.

Normal.name: High Uranium Rocket Type
Normal.description: A damaging mini nuke. It is going to deal <c=damage>7</c> damage and stun its targeted ship part.

Normal.name: P.A.I.N
Normal.description: The end. It is going to deal <c=damage>10</c> damage and stun its targeted ship part.

Normal.name: Heavy Torpedo
Normal.description: This missile is going to deal <c=damage>3</c> DMG and apply <c=damage>2</c> <c=status>ENGINE LOCK</c>.

Normal.name: Small Space Mine
Normal.description: Destroying it will damage it's destroyer for <c=damage>1</c>.

Normal.name: Signal Amplifier MKII
Normal.description: Beams 2 <c=status>DRAW NEXT TURN</c> at its target once per turn.

Normal.name: Signal Amplifier
Normal.description: Beams 1 <c=status>DRAW NEXT TURN</c> at its target once per turn.
